verses.roman:
se vatsara śivānanda patnī lañā āilā
'purīdāsa'-choṭa-putre saṅgete ānilā

synonyms: se vatsara—that year; śivānanda—Śivānanda Sena; patnī—the wife; lañā—bringing; āilā—came; purī-dāsa—Purīdāsa; choṭa-putre—the youngest son; saṅgete ānilā—he brought with him.
translation: That year, Śivānanda Sena brought with him his wife and youngest son, Purīdāsa.
